name: lustre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ S or U ] the brightness that a shiny surface has: a treatment for restoring the lustre to dull hair the rich lustre of well-polished furniture
[ U ] a very special, attractive quality that people admire: The dancing of the principal ballerina added lustre to an otherwise unimpressive production of "Giselle".
